abstract: NBA Roundup; Brooklyn Nets beat Atlanta Hawks, 90-88; other pro basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Brook Lopez had 26 points, and Thaddeus Young hit two free throws with 1.4 seconds left to give the Nets a home victory over Atlanta.

headline.main: Free Throws Carry Nets Over Hawks
headline.print_headline: Free Throws Carry Nets Over Hawks

snippet: Brook Lopez had 26 points, and Thaddeus Young hit two free throws with 1.4 seconds left to give the Nets a home victory over Atlanta.
